name: Yum! Finger
summary:
"Yum finger" is a leisure exciting game, players in the game's role is a little fat man is trying to lose weight, you need to finger on the screen, moving through crazy escape cake, ham, green beans, donuts, bananas, etc., which are small monster, once they touch, the fat man will explode! But don't worry, food monsters will be according to their own favorite fixed track running, so as long as your response fast enough, or after a few sessions, just to avoid them well!
Set in the game, there are props, novice players can through use of them to put into this crazy game as soon as possible and then got gold and the great achievement badges. Do not hesitate to begin the fun and exciting trip to burn calories glory!!!!
